title: Episode 8 - Neil Blumenthal, Co-Founder & Co-CEO, Warby Parker
description: In this discussion about e-commerce strategies and how to build lasting relationships with customers, Neil Blumenthal of Warby Parker shares some of his secrets for disruption.
dc:creator: Bloomberg
